thread.title: Salem runs past Blacksburg to remain undefeated
thread.title_full: Salem runs past Blacksburg to remain undefeated

title: Salem runs past Blacksburg to remain undefeated
text:
Blacksburg bicyclist dies after being hit by car Thursday morning 
Blacksburg played host to undefeated Salem. 
While the Bruins were down 7-0 in the first quarter, Blacksburg stayed with the Spartans early. Isaac Johnston passed the ball to Morgan McCoy for a big gain, as McCoy tip-toed down the sideline after the catch.Then Johnston and McCoy would hook up again, capping off the drive with the touchdown pass, tying things at 7-7.But the Spartans would put on an air show of their own. Noah Beckley connected with Viante Tucker for the touchdown, as Salem goes up 14-7. 
The Spartans would then start to get the running game going. Alex Ramsey comes bursting out of the pile, and he finds the end zone. Ramsey's second rushing touchdown of the night makes it 21-7.Donte Clayborne is the other force out of the Salem backfield. He ran 39 yards down the sideline and in for the score, as the Spartans run away with it, 56-10.
